app.jumbotron_text: Sign in to your TBME Labs account using your username and password.

logout.logout_succeed_alert_text: We hope to see you again soon!

confirmation.confirmation_failed_alert_text: Please try to sign up again or contact our support.
confirmation.confirmation_succeed_alert_text: Start using all our TBME Labs applications now.

errors.title: Authentication failed:
errors.account_disabled_text: Account not enabled! Please confirm your email address or contact our support.
errors.account_locked_text: Your account is locked! Please contact our support for any questions.
